product.name: Samsung Galaxy S9 Unlocked Smartphone, Titanium Grey (SM-G960WZAAXAC)

pos_sample_comments.comment: Google's product suite is extremely smart and integrates with everything seamlessly.
The Samsung Galaxy has a great camera and it being an android phone is a plus.
Coming from an Galaxy S7, this was a major upgrade.
Applications stay in memory for what seems like forever
Rest of the functionality is standard easy to use android.
Android has come leaps and bounds up in quality, presentation, looks and a overall solid ecosystem in the 4 years since I bought my previous phone!
I switched from an iPhone 6 and am seriously impressed with the hardware and software.
The built in switching app got my contacts and some things over
I am a Samsung fan and even though there will be a new one shortly, this was a great deal during the amazon sale.

sample_comments.comment: I also can't customize my apps like I used to.
I hate Samsung Bixby so i completely disabled it.
It's SO stupid and you have to make a Samsung account just to disable it.
Coming from an Galaxy S7, this was a major upgrade.
No stupid bixby, no edged screens, no finicky buttons, no constant changing of app permissions/notifications and no excessive options that just don't work.
Rest of the functionality is standard easy to use android.
Google's product suite is extremely smart and integrates with everything seamlessly.
The Samsung Galaxy has a great camera and it being an android phone is a plus.
Applications stay in memory for what seems like forever

neg_sample_comments.comment: It's SO stupid and you have to make a Samsung account just to disable it.
No stupid bixby, no edged screens, no finicky buttons, no constant changing of app permissions/notifications and no excessive options that just don't work.
I also can't customize my apps like I used to.
I hate Samsung Bixby so i completely disabled it.
Due to the lack of update support I give this phone a 4/5.
Being a stock android user, I had to install third party launcher immediately and disabled some duplicate apps from Samsung as I use the same services from Google.
However, a very quick search online told me how to disable it entirely.
I give it a 5 but would like to see some more innovations, eg., an S9+ app that can be used on the computer for answering emails, texts, etc.
My complaints with the phone so far are mainly software related.

pos_sample_comments.comment: It's so bright, bold and beautiful!)

and the display itself is just second to none in terms of clarity and colour reproduction.

great for watching youtube or whatever in bed with nice deep blacks, and movies have smaller black bars than a regular 16:9 screen as this is a 18.5:9 display which is closer to the movie standard filming ratio.
Just awesome, I was worried that the purple would be to feminine but it ended up being simply beautiful with everyone complimenting its color.
-screen is super clear, colors are great, it has very deep blacks,and vibrant colors with hdr 10

I had theee different couriers over the last few years and had the S6 and nexus 6P.

pos_sample_comments.comment: They sound great.
As dumb as this sounds, I love that this thing now has stereo speakers.

The other manufacturers may have featured dual cameras and stereo speakers on their phones for some time before Samsung, but I'm very pleased that the S9+ has them for me to use and enjoy - better late than never.
The stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos makes watching tv shows and movies on my phone pretty enjoyable.

sample_comments.comment: They sound great.
As dumb as this sounds, I love that this thing now has stereo speakers.

The other manufacturers may have featured dual cameras and stereo speakers on their phones for some time before Samsung, but I'm very pleased that the S9+ has them for me to use and enjoy - better late than never.
The stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos makes watching tv shows and movies on my phone pretty enjoyable.
